column4: tryin to remove all traces of gnome so i may then reinstall gnome as currently its broken... i thought i had done this but it is still showing a session type at the login screen  please help!!!
no packes needed to be removed
did you copy and paste that complete thing into a console?
yes   im gonna restart x to dbl check gnome is still showing   brb
no luck   gnome is still there in session type at the login screen
tracking down the desktop, a sec

it gave you a list of what it was going to remove, you didn't look it over?
